name: Conquer The Tower 2 - Takeover
description:
Tired of traditional tower defense strategy games?
Let's take over the enemy's towers and conquer the world once more. And this time, our adventure will start from the desert!

How to play:
Swipe your finger to connect towers. What you need to do is to take over the towers of other colors.
The victory is yours when all the towers are occupied by BLUE soldiers.

Features:
1. A rich variety of troops and unique abilities.
2. Various scenes.
3. Plenty of festival events.
4. Smooth UI with splendid graphic design.
5. Upgradation of troops and towers available

The Best Time-Killer for both you & your friends!
